user.bio: Wigston Field's top ticker.  Previously on Ratebeer.

items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 295 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 60!

items.checkin_comment: From RB. Sweet sugary pear aroma. Flavor is slightly dryer but still too sweet for me. Easy to drink but that’s not what I’m looking for in a perry or a cider.

items.badge_description: Grab a pot and put it on your head because you're a modern day Johnny Appleseed. That's 20 different ciders. Try 5 more to unlock Level 5.

items.checkin_comment: Very sweet. Nice when it's hot out, though.

user.bio: Back in rural US after loving the exploration I got in Belgium. Always on the hunt for that perfect dubbel or quad!

items.badge_description: Goooooaaaalllll! Cheers to all of the teams playing in the Women's World Cup!
Happy 4th of July! Here's a toast to America's independence and to celebration with good friends, good food and most importantly, good beers!
